General.Name: Hanjin Kal
General.Description: Hanjin Kal, together with its subsidiaries, provides airline services. It owns and operates 155 aircrafts and scheduled flights to 13 cities in Korea and 107 cities in 42 countries worldwide. The company also owns and operates hotels; operates a resort hotel; provides management consulting and licensing; real estate leasing; and offers travel and tourism related services. In addition, it provides building management services, including building maintenance services, parking lot operation and maintenance, and facility rental services. Hanjin Kal was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

3.Name: Mr. Sung-Hwan  Lee
3.Title: Sr. MD & Financial Control Team Mang.
